prompts.prompt_text:
I want to enhance the mata logging in the following ways.

1. Show what system hooks fire.
2. Make % of context more front and center and showcase in a thermobar (this is most of what I care about when monitoring runs).
3. Indent tool use under assistant completion calls to show hiearchy of tool use.
4. When an assistant session starts draw the [assitant] part before the call so we now it's waiting on a LLM call if it's paused.
5. Move the model and agent name into the [assistant/tool] part and make the meta data part purely metrics.
